name: Personal Portfolio
description: Built using ReactJS to establish a digital precence, It showcases information about me, projects that encompass my areas of interest and learning endeavors and blogs on various topics.

name: Live Weather App
description: Built using ReactJS, Express to integrate "OpenWeatherMap API" for real-time and historical air pollution data. It also provides accurate location-based weather forecasts, aiding users in planning activities based on atmospheric conditions.
